meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern dish made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic.
meanings.sent1: I tried hoummoses for the first time at the party.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best hoummoses in town.
meanings.sent3: The hoummoses danced on my taste buds with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a bowl of hoummoses.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of hoummoses filled the kitchen, making my stomach growl.

meanings.definition: To spread hoummoses on pita bread.
meanings.sent1: I hoummoses my pita bread generously before eating.
meanings.sent2: Remember to hoummoses the bread evenly for the perfect taste.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally hoummoses his shirt instead of the bread!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness hoummoses through the community like a spreading sauce.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly hoummoses the pita bread with a flick of the wrist.

meanings.sent1: I couldn't resist the temptation of the creamy hoummoses.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served hoummoses with a sprinkle of paprika on top.
meanings.sent3: The hoummoses whispered 'eat me' as I passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a bowl of freshly made hoummoses.
meanings.sent5: The hoummoses disappeared from the plate in seconds, leaving only a satisfied smile.
